blogPost.title: How can people just starting to build their credit and wealth use technology to create good money habits? Answer by Poulomi Damany, General Manager of Assets at Credit Karma. https://t.co/X1r6T4QG8P https://t.co/qAWwd5EqIg
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 信用と富を築き始めたばかりの人々が、テクノロジーを利用して良いお金の習慣を作るにはどうしたらいいでしょうか？回答：Poulomi Damany, General Manager of Assets at Credit Karma. https://t.co/X1r6T4QG8P https://t.co/qAWwd5EqIg
刚开始建立信用和财富的人如何利用技术来建立良好的金钱习惯？回答者：Poulomi Damany，Credit Karma的资产部总经理。https://t.co/X1r6T4QG8P https://t.co/qAWwd5EqIg
剛開始建立信用和財富的人如何利用技術來建立良好的金錢習慣？回答者：Poulomi Damany，Credit Karma的資產部總經理。https://t.co/X1r6T4QG8P https://t.co/qAWwd5EqIg

关于血压有哪些迷思？答案：@KeckMedUSC. https://t.co/uhZwzPCRBs https://t.co/iL9sAIDa2G

next.title: What will the impact of AI be on the marketing industry? Answer by @ElenaMMelnikova, CMO @Talkwalker. https://t.co/vvb6JSH13z https://t.co/5Z0SNnvh78

localize.full_text: AIはマーケティング業界にどのような影響を与えるのでしょうか？Answer by @ElenaMMelnikova, CMO @Talkwalker. https://t.co/vvb6JSH13z https://t.co/5Z0SNnvh78
人工智能对营销行业的影响将是什么？回答者：@ElenaMMelnikova，CMO @Talkwalker。https://t.co/vvb6JSH13z https://t.co/5Z0SNnvh78
人工智能對營銷行業的影響將是什麼？回答者：@ElenaMMelnikova，CMO @Talkwalker。https://t.co/vvb6JSH13z https://t.co/5Z0SNnvh78
